snippet: Boston Medical Center has received a $25 million gift that it will use to combat the growing public health crisis stemming from opioid drug addiction....

headline.main: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule
headline.print_headline: Senate to Consider Repeal of Obama-Era Labor Rule

lead_paragraph: Boston Medical Center has received a $25 million gift that it will use to combat the growing public health crisis stemming from opioid drug addiction.
